values_and_motivations: I thrive in collaborative environments where I can both learn and teach
I'm motivated by solving complex problems that have real user impact
I value continuous learning and staying current with industry trends

common_answers.why_leaving: I'm looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow in [area]. While I've learned a lot at my current role, I'm excited about [what this new role offers].
common_answers.greatest_strength: My ability to break down complex problems into manageable pieces and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
common_answers.greatest_weakness: I sometimes spend too much time perfecting details. I've learned to set timeboxes and prioritize shipping over perfection.
common_answers.where_in_5_years: I see myself growing into a leadership role where I can drive technical strategy while mentoring the next generation of engineers.
common_answers.salary_expectations: I'm focused on finding the right fit. I'd love to learn more about the total compensation package and ensure we're aligned.
